overview: Internet broadcaster, BJ Si-won, brings home men to comfort herself. She started the broadcast at first to make money, but the positive response she received inspired her to make the broadcast more stimulating.  She seduces men with her erotic moves.  Another BJ, Seri, does everything to get responses, but she can't. She asks BJ Si-won for help. Si-won suggests real sex and Seri calls in her boyfriend.
title: Erotic Moves: Director's Cut
